exercises.question: What are small parts of a company that you can buy?
I have lived here ______ 2010.
She has been a broker ______ five years.
A ______ is a collection of different investments.
How ______ have you had those shares?
The ______ is the profit you get from an investment.
We have owned this house ______ a long time.
A ______ is a payment made by a company to its shareholders.
He has worked in finance ______ he graduated.
Every investment carries some level of ______.
They have had that account ______ three months.
A ______ helps you buy and sell stocks.
I haven't seen the manager ______ last Tuesday.
______ are loans to governments or companies.
Has she had the same portfolio ______ ten years?
We haven't received a ______ this year.
I have known him ______ we were children.
Is the ______ on these bonds high or low?
How long ______ you been an investor?
Shares are also called ______.
I have had this portfolio ______ (since/for) two years.
A ______ is a person who buys and sells stocks for you.
She has worked here ______ (since/for) 2018.
High risk usually means high ______.
They ______ ______ (have/has) (own) these shares for a decade.
A ______ is a payment from a company to shareholders.
How ______ have you been waiting for the market to open?
He has ______ (be) a client of this bank since January.
A ______ is a collection of investments.
I haven't invested in ______ (stocks/shares) since the crisis.
We have had this investment ______ (since/for) ages.
Governments issue ______ to borrow money.
He ______ ______ (not / see) his broker since Monday.
The ______ of losing money is part of investing.
I have ______ (have) this account since I was eighteen.
______ (For/Since) how long have they lived in New York?
The ______ on this savings account is very low.
She has ______ (be) interested in finance for years.
Investors like companies that pay regular ______.
We haven't bought any bonds ______ (since/for) 2020.
have / I / had / portfolio / since / 2015 / this
exercises.answer: I have had this portfolio since 2015

exercises.question: been / she / has / broker / a / for / years / ten
exercises.answer: she has been a broker for ten years

exercises.question: long / how / you / have / invested / ? / been
exercises.answer: how long have you been invested ?

exercises.question: risk / investment / has / some / every
not / they / since / have / dividends / paid / March
exercises.answer: they have not paid dividends since March

exercises.question: is / collection / a / portfolio / a / of / investments
exercises.answer: a portfolio is a collection of investments

exercises.question: he / known / has / for / months / him / three
exercises.answer: he has known him for three months

exercises.question: yield / is / the / on / bonds / high / these
exercises.answer: the yield on these bonds is high

exercises.question: we / stocks / have / since / bought / not / last / year
exercises.answer: we have not bought stocks since last year

exercises.question: bought / she / has / since / shares / more / Tuesday
exercises.answer: she has bought more shares since Tuesday
